```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

https://www.smoochfood.com/2023/04/richmond-night-market-list-of-food.html

```{r, engine = 'bash', eval = FALSE}
# how to sort the headings
tail -n +43 Richmond-Night-Market-2023.Rmd > Richmond_Night_Market.tmp

perl -0777 -ne '\
    (undef,@paragraphs) = split /^###(?=)/m; \
    print map {"###$_"} sort @paragraphs;\
' Richmond_Night_Market.tmp > Richmond_Night_Market.md

cat <(head -n 14 Richmond-Night-Market-2023.Rmd) Richmond_Night_Market.md > Richmond-Night-Market-2023.Rmd

rm Richmond_Night_Market.tmp Richmond_Night_Market.md

# tallying entries per vendor
mkdir tmp && cd tmp 
count=$(grep -c "^###" ../Richmond-Night-Market-2023.Rmd)
csplit -k ../Richmond-Night-Market-2023.Rmd "/###/" {$count}  
rm xx00
for i in *; do name=$(head -n1 $i | sed 's/^### //'); mv $i "${name}"; done

grep -c '^<' * | sort -k2,2nr -t: > ../data/raw/Richmond-Night-Market-2023_counts.txt

cd .. && rm -rf tmp
```

```{r message = FALSE}
tally <- readr::read_delim("data/raw/Richmond-Night-Market-2023_counts.txt", delim = ":", col_names = c("Vendor", "Tally"))

DT::datatable(tally)
```
